item.title: Never Type Your Password Again: Automatic SSH Logins in Windows Terminal
item.description: Requirement Procedures Generate key Execute ssh-keygen and generate the file id_rsa 1C:\Users\dennys>ssh-keygen 2Generating public/private rsa key pair. 3Enter file in which to save the key (C:\Users\dennys/.ssh/id_rsa): The content of id_rsa is like the following. 1ssh-rsa AAAAB******************== dennys@mypc123 Put the key on Linux Open the file ~/.ssh/authorized_keys and paste the content of id_rsa into it. Test automatically login Execute ssh name@host, you don't need to input password any more. Configuratino Windows Terminal
